mapper.insert: insert into mybatis.AccountConfirmation (ConfirmID, TransactionCfmDate, ReturnCode, BusinessCode, TransactionDate, TransactionTime, TASerialNO, FromTAFlag, RegionCode, NetNo, Specification, CustomerNo, ErrorDetail, AppSheetSerialNo, TACode, TAAccountID, DistributorCode, ReferenceNumber) values (#{ConfirmID}, #{TransactionCfmDate}, #{ReturnCode}, #{BusinessCode}, #{TransactionDate}, #{TransactionTime}, #{TASerialNO}, #{FromTAFlag}, #{RegionCode}, #{NetNo}, #{Specification}, #{CustomerNo}, #{ErrorDetail}, #{AppSheetSerialNo}, #{TACode}, #{TAAccountID}, #{DistributorCode}, #{ReferenceNumber})
mapper.update: update mybatis.AccountConfirmation set TransactionCfmDate = #{TransactionCfmDate}, ReturnCode = #{ReturnCode}, BusinessCode = #{BusinessCode}, TransactionDate = #{TransactionDate}, TransactionTime = #{TransactionTime}, TASerialNO = #{TASerialNO}, FromTAFlag = #{FromTAFlag}, RegionCode = #{RegionCode}, NetNo = #{NetNo}, Specification = #{Specification}, CustomerNo = #{CustomerNo}, ErrorDetail = #{ErrorDetail}, AppSheetSerialNo = #{AppSheetSerialNo}, TACode = #{TACode}, TAAccountID = #{TAAccountID}, DistributorCode = #{DistributorCode}, ReferenceNumber = #{ReferenceNumber}) where ConfirmID = #{ConfirmID}
